parameters.name: DstEntityId
parameters.description: The destination entity ID. For more information, see the table ID or field ID in the response returned by the ListTables or ListColumns operation. You can also specify a custom entity ID.

parameters.name: DstEntityName
parameters.description: The destination entity name. Supports fuzzy matching.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order in which schemas are sorted. Default value: Asc. Valid values:

*   Asc: ascending.
*   Desc: descending.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: The sort field. Default value: Name.

parameters.name: SrcEntityId
parameters.description: The source entity ID. For more information, see the table ID or field ID in the response returned by the ListTables or ListColumns operation. You can also specify a custom entity ID.

parameters.name: SrcEntityName
parameters.description: The source entity name. Supports fuzzy matching.
